name: @cagov/ds-accordion
description: Accordions are expandable sections of content. Each section contains a heading (H2 or H3), a plus button (+), and more body text when opened.

scripts.build: sass src/index.scss src/css/index.css && npm run build:js
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run html:preview && npm run build && npm test && npm run cdn:publish

author: ca.gov
